item.title: This website's design file
item.description: This is the original figma file for this website. There's quite a lot difference between that and the current HTML/CSS code.

item.title: Black and White
item.description: Pure black and white images or designs just have that nice feel to them.

item.title: Icons showing the same wolf in various sizes
item.description: You thought this was just an unassuming wolf - but wait! It's scary! What? It's not?

item.description: The transparency create a nice effect.

item.title: Things to do for this website
item.description: Things to do and to fix for this website. This website was hastily constructed. Efforts need to be invested to polish it.

item.title: Magicbread.ca fictional bakery
item.description: A reasonably complete website design for a fictional bakery website.

item.title: Resources for learning frontend development
item.description: Books, articles, people. On HTML, CSS, JavaScript, functional programming, a11y, and more.
